mapper.select: SELECT t.memoryTrain_id, t.memoryTrain_words, t.memoryTrain_which_day, t.memoryTrain_type, t.memoryTrain_score, t.memoryTrain_number, memoryTrain_error_number, t.exercise_id, t.create_time FROM memorytrain t where t.memoryTrain_which_day=#{memoryTrainWhichDay} and t.memoryTrain_type=#{memoryTrainType} and t.exercise_id=#{exerciseId}
